FuncDef: The reset statistics fabric-queue multicast command deletes statistics about the upstream multicast VoQs on a board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the board where the VoQs are buffered.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To delete statistics about upstream multicast VoQs on a board, run the reset statistics fabric-queue multicast command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
